page.title: 16TRADE IN BRYNNAU
page.content: The owner of the postoffice is Mrs V.M.Lamenton.Most of the trading is done in local small shops which are mainly converted houses.There are{5.} shops which sell:_ Groceries,Sweets,Toiletris,Newspaper s,Fruit and Vegetables.There is one video shop which hires out videos.One shop has a small section which is a chip making facilities. Most money comes from employment and un employment benefit. In our survey of a 100 people we found that 59 of that 100 said they use the shops ocasianly 25 said they use it for most things and only 3 said they use it hardly ever.out of the same 100 63 said the local shops sufficiant and 22 said they were not. { BY HAYLEY LEWIS {+ {EMMA EVANS
